SELECT t.JOB_NAME, t.JOB_GROUP, hd.DESCRIPTION, hd.REQUEST_TYPE, hd.HTTP_URL, hd.HTTP_PARAMS, hd.CREATE_TIME, ct.CRON_EXPRESSION FROM QRTZ_TRIGGERS t LEFT JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS ct ON ( t.TRIGGER_NAME = ct.TRIGGER_NAME AND t.TRIGGER_GROUP = ct.TRIGGER_GROUP ) LEFT JOIN HTTPJOB_DETAILS hd ON ( t.JOB_NAME = hd.JOB_NAME AND t.JOB_GROUP = hd.JOB_GROUP ) WHERE 1=1
AND ( t.JOB_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{searchParam},'%') OR t.JOB_GROUP LIKE concat('%',#{searchParam},'%') )
ORDER BY hd.ID DESC
limit #{beginIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM QRTZ_TRIGGERS t LEFT JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS ct ON ( t.TRIGGER_NAME = ct.TRIGGER_NAME AND t.TRIGGER_GROUP = ct.TRIGGER_GROUP ) LEFT JOIN HTTPJOB_DETAILS hd ON ( t.JOB_NAME = hd.JOB_NAME AND t.JOB_GROUP = hd.JOB_GROUP ) WHERE 1=1
AND ( t.JOB_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{searchParam},'%') OR t.JOB_GROUP LIKE concat('%',#{searchParam},'%') )

SELECT hd.JOB_NAME, hd.JOB_GROUP, hd.DESCRIPTION, hd.REQUEST_TYPE, hd.HTTP_URL, hd.HTTP_PARAMS, hd.CREATE_TIME FROM HTTPJOB_DETAILS hd LEFT JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS qt ON ( hd.JOB_NAME = qt.JOB_NAME AND hd.JOB_GROUP = qt.JOB_GROUP ) WHERE (qt.JOB_NAME IS NULL AND qt.JOB_GROUP IS NULL)
AND ( hd.JOB_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{searchParam},'%') OR hd.JOB_GROUP LIKE concat('%',#{searchParam},'%') )

limit #{beginIndex},#{pageSize}
